source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Creating Repeat Patterns On iPad Using Assembly App

visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer
visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe

items.headline: Easily create geometric and hand-drawn patterns with just your iPad!
objectives_summary: Learn to use Assembly App to create geometric designs.
Leran to create a repeating pattern of the designs created.
Learn to test the patterns and fine tune them to achieve perfect repeatability.

items.title: Basic Mixed Media Design
items.headline: a step-by-lesson in beginning mexed media!
objectives_summary: types of mixed media supplies and what they do
how to make art with layers
how to make a step-by-step mixed media piece

items.title: Make Herbal Soap, Embedded Soap, Baby Soap + Wipes Making
items.headline: This course is a complete guideline to make Herbal soap,  Embedded soap,  baby soap and make baby wipes at home
objectives_summary: How to Make Herbal Soap
Preparing the Soap Base
How to Make Embedded Soap

items.title: Charcoal Drawing Course: Realistic Drawing with Pencil

visible_instructors.title: Homa Tayefeh

visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.name: Matin
visible_instructors.title: Matin Shafiei

items.headline: Learn How to Draw and Sketch with Pencil & Charcoal. Realistic Pencil and Charcoal Drawing
objectives_summary: You can learn to work with coal Conte to create components
It also helps on creating the volumes
You will learn the simple steps of creating textures

items.title: Learn Christmas inspired  Procreate Illustrations Pattern
items.headline: Procreate Pattern Christmas Design: Creating a Collection Digital illustration has never been more fun, make digital art
objectives_summary: How to make Christmas digital illustrations using procreate
You will understand how to use Procreate's powerful art tools.
You will learn a workflow, step-by-step, that works for many digital illustrations in Procreate

items.title: Abstract Impressionism With 3D,  "Reflection"
items.headline: "Reflection" Rendering of the nature
objectives_summary: Create your own painting in one lesson
Understanding Abstract Art, Do And Dont's of Abstract Art, Six things you should know as an Abstract Painter
Colours & Combinations

items.title: Painting Wild Places with Watercolors: Aqua World

visible_instructors.job_title: Signature Member of the National Watercolor Society
visible_instructors.name: Gary
visible_instructors.title: Gary Spetz

items.headline: Step-by-step instructional videos with a downloadable Color Painting Reference and full-size Traceable Drawing Guide.
objectives_summary: Successfully paint a bold, dynamic, detailed watercolor landscape.
Gain confidence in controlling the sometimes unwieldy characteristic of watercolor.

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 8: Buildings and Landscape
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: Students will learn some basic elements of composition in Byzantine iconography and how to draw buildings and landscapes.

items.title: How to Paint Night Landscapes in Watercolor
items.headline: Learn to paint 6 exciting night landscapes.
objectives_summary: Hands-on lessons on essential watercolor techniques such as wet-in-wet and wet-on-dry, dry brush and paint 'flicking'
How to paint any night landscape in watercolor from a photograph.
Sketching - how to reduce a photo or scene in front of you down to essentials and pick out elements and objects of focus.

items.title: Watercolor Course for Beginners
items.headline: A Complete Beginners Guide to Watercolor Art. From Beginner  to Advance Levels of Painting.
objectives_summary: Basics of watercolors that would help you to paint amazing watercolor paintings. From step by step beginners painting to advance paintings, with minimal products and revision sheets to practice.

items.title: Brush Lettering : Learn to draw letters with brush pens
items.headline: The "write" way to beautiful letters, quotes, texts
objectives_summary: Learn to draw letters with a brush pens.

items.title: Crafting Papers to Planter Sleeves

visible_instructors.title: Cloudia David

items.headline: A DIY guide to a home decor solution for your Indoor Plants
objectives_summary: Paper Craft
Paper Scoring Techniques
Paper Folding Techniques

items.title: Learn Watercolour in Five Fun Classes with Jane Davies
items.headline: An Introduction to Beautiful Watercolour from Beginner to Master Class
objectives_summary: Learn my loose flowing wet on wet technique
Easy to follow steps
First beautiful piece in just 15 minutes!

items.title: Decorate your Flowerpots with Acrylic Pouring/Fluid Art

visible_instructors.title: Isha Knill

items.headline: Learn how to create beautiful Flowerpots using Acrylic Pouring/Fluid Art
objectives_summary: How to decorate flowerpots using acrylic pouring or fluid art
Learn a new hobby
Create great gift's to give to friends and family

items.title: Sew the Oxford Purse. An easy to sew purse for beginners.
items.headline: FREE sewing pattern included. Learn to install a simple closure, sew a lined purse and make perfect darts with ease.
objectives_summary: How to mark and sew darts perfectly
How to install a magnetic snap
Tips for top stitching around curves so your flap will look fabulous

items.title: How Color Pencil Drawing
items.headline: Drawing Animals Course, Step by Step with color Pencils
objectives_summary: Drawing Of Animals
